messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

outlook meeting tracking status issue meeting tracking status issue hello please be kind log ticket under name help out by investigating peculiar behavior when she accesses tracking status for scheduled meeting she gets list meeting rooms although she selected any them please below one meeting have set up for comparison calendar seems behave expected thank you best regards leader ext en
